meanings.meaning: 1. beginning; start; outset; opening 旅行の初めの二日間は雨降りだった。The first two days of my trip were rainy.
2. first (in line, etc.) esp. 初め
3. origin esp. 始め

4. such as ...; not to mention ... Usually written using kana alone, esp. 始め; as 〜を始め, 〜を始めとして, etc.この語学センターでは、英語をはじめ世界１５か国の外国語が学べる。At this language centre, about 15 international languages are taught, including English.
初め 【はじめ】
1. beginning; start; outset; opening 旅行の初めの二日間は雨降りだった。The first two days of my trip were rainy.
2. first (in line, etc.) esp. 初め
3. origin esp. 始め

4. such as ...; not to mention ... Usually written using kana alone, esp. 始め; as 〜を始め, 〜を始めとして, etc.この語学センターでは、英語をはじめ世界１５か国の外国語が学べる。At this language centre, about 15 international languages are taught, including English.
初め 【はじめ】

sentences.translation: The first two days of my trip were rainy.
At this language centre, about 15 international languages are taught, including English.

meanings.type: Adverb (fukushi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 1. for the first time See also 始める１６歳の時、初めてテニスをした。When I was sixteen, I played tennis for the first time.

2. only after ... is it ...; only when ... do you ...; not until ... do you ... after the -te form of a verbしかし、抗議を通して初めて自由で開かれた社会が維持されるのである。Only through protest can a free and open society be maintained.
3. first time; (one's) first Colloquial
始めて 【はじめて】、甫めて 【はじめて】
甫めて: Rarely-used kanji form.

meanings.type: Adverb (fukushi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

2. only after ... is it ...; only when ... do you ...; not until ... do you ... after the -te form of a verbしかし、抗議を通して初めて自由で開かれた社会が維持されるのである。Only through protest can a free and open society be maintained.

始めて 【はじめて】、甫めて 【はじめて】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to begin; to start; to commence

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to happen (again); to begin (anew)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to date (from); to originate (in)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to begin; to start; to commence

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to happen (again); to begin (anew)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to date (from); to originate (in)
1. to start; to begin; to commence; to initiate; to originate Only applies to 始めるいつゴルフを始めたのですか。When did you begin playing golf?
2. to start up (a business, society, etc.); to open (e.g. a store); to establish 私たちは姉妹３人で喫茶店を始めた。We three sisters opened a coffee shop.
3. to start ...; to begin to ... Only applies to 始める, after the -masu stem of a verb飲み過ぎて部屋が回り始めた。The room started to spin after I drank too much.
創める 【はじめる】
創める: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. to start; to begin; to commence; to initiate; to originate Only applies to 始めるいつゴルフを始めたのですか。When did you begin playing golf?
2. to start up (a business, society, etc.); to open (e.g. a store); to establish 私たちは姉妹３人で喫茶店を始めた。We three sisters opened a coffee shop.
3. to start ...; to begin to ... Only applies to 始める, after the -masu stem of a verb飲み過ぎて部屋が回り始めた。The room started to spin after I drank too much.
創める 【はじめる】
創める: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: When did you begin playing golf?
We three sisters opened a coffee shop.
The room started to spin after I drank too much.

1. first departure (of the day); first train; first bus See also 終発

1. management; dealing with; settlement; cleaning up; disposal 彼は午後いっぱい使って昨年のほうれん草の根を始末した。He's spent all afternoon rooting up last year's spinach plants.
2. course of events; circumstances; particulars

3. end result (usu. bad); outcome 世界からは【麻疹輸出国】と嫌味とも本音ともとれることをいわれている始末。Ending up with being called a "measles exporting country" by the rest of the world, something that you could take as insult or truth.
4. economizing; economising; frugality; being thrifty
仕末 【しまつ】
仕末: Irregular kanji usage.

仕末 【しまつ】

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 1. origin; beginning; genesis

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 2. primeval; primordial; primitive
1. beginning and end 前の会社では何でも屋に終始したので今度は専門職に就きたい。I wore several hats at my last office so I'd like to specialize this time.
2. doing something from beginning to end; being unchanged from beginning to end 私服警官が終始大統領の身辺を固めていた。The private detectives accompanied the President everywhere.
3. from beginning to end; the whole time; throughout; consistently

sentences.translation: I wore several hats at my last office so I'd like to specialize this time.
The private detectives accompanied the President everywhere.
